Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2008 03:22PM KATIEKAY wrote: Hi Auntiekayro:  The waiting is the hardest part, Its really hard to think postive but you really need to. I'll be thinking of you and hoping for the best. Good Luck Katie Kay
Posts.Title: feeling lonely,nervous,anxiety ridden auntiekayro GryffinSong

Posts.Content: Mar 27, 2009 09:53AM KATIEKAY wrote: Karen43 I agree with you, started to read these posts and know I'm starting to doubt my decisions. I also am going to start rads in April, Had a lumpectomy in Dec 08 and another one last week to get clear margins and check nodes.  Have clear margins and nodes are clear, This was all for secretory cancer not treatable with rads or chemo. Now i'm told have DCIS, they want to do rads and start me on tamofixin. Doctor told me mastectomy was probably a overkill. I want to keep my breast. I never have had a MRI. They are just know checking for HER. Somethimes I think I read to much on this site and it scares me, Am I making the right decisions.KatieKay
Posts.Title: Atypia Hyperplasia-Now What? mkd1061 Petitegal127

Posts.Content: KATIEKAY wrote: HI LADIES: JUST WANT TO KNOW IF ANYONE HAD BAD EXPERIENCE AT SLOAN KETTERING. I WENT THERE FOR SECOND OPINION AND WAS TREATED, HOW DO I SAY IT, JUST FELT DISRESPECTED, THEY WERE NOT AT ALL WHAT I EXPECTED, AND MY DOCTOR IS VERY DISAPPOINTED . ANYONE ELSE BEEN THERE. Posts.Title: Sloan-Kettering KATIEKAY Hortense

Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2009 10:01AM KATIEKAY wrote: Ladies, Please don't let my visit scare you away from what is suppose to be a excellent hospital. The doctor I saw was nothing but professional, Its was the people you had to deal with before getting to her. They were not professional at all during registration and during any calls I made. Even my doctors office had problems with the reception.  Maybe they had a bad, still and all they really should act more professional, we are going thru alot. KatieKay
Posts.Title: Sloan-Kettering KATIEKAY Hortense

Posts.Content: Feb 16, 2009 09:36AM KATIEKAY wrote: Hi Ladies: Thanks for your replies, I spoke with my doctor and she has called Sloan Kettering three times with no return call. They wanted to set me up with another appointment on Feb 24th for a follow up mammo (really, I'm not driving 4 some hours for a mammo) Had a mammo done here and sent down to them. Hopefully they will consult with my doctor after their pathologist look at my slides which I left there. I still don't have clear margins, and waiting to see what the next step is. I'm getting a little better about this waiting game. I've lost 11 pounds since this all began, thats the only good thing i can say so far. I really love the support and care thats on this board. Wishing you all the best. Katie Kay
